childMdx.excerpt: All my time spent, no time at all lost, in singularity:   this many-folded matrix, clear manifest of every message.   What touched one heart…
Still a foolish scholar, still a naked man bare before the gaze, now gifted simplicity.   None of this matters: reality is nothing like a…
That old music, the beat beneath time, taps out this peace, now arriving at the part where you tell me the whole is suspended in  Grace…
